problem_text_cn: 如图,在直角△BAD中,延长斜边BD到点C,使DC=\frac{1}{2}BD,连接AC,若\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{5}{3},则tan∠CAD的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the right angle △BAD, extend the hypotenuse BD to point C, make DC = \frac{N_0}{N_1} BD, connect AC, if \frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{N_2}{N_3}, then the value of tan∠CAD is ()
raw_answer:
解:作DE⊥AD交AC于E．
在Rt△ABD中,∵\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{5}{3},设AD=5k,AB=3k,∵∠ADE=∠BAD=90°,∴DE∥AB,∴\frac{DE}{AB}=\frac{CD}{CB}=\frac{1}{3},∴DE=k,
在Rt△ADE中,tan∠CAD=\frac{DE}{AD}=\frac{1}{5},
故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查解直角三角形、平行线分线段成比例定理等知识,解题的关键是学会添加常用辅助线,属于中考常考题型．
